Located on the first floor, these air-conditioned cabins offer sliding doors with panoramic views of the bay. It is designed and fitted to international standards, featuring rich wood decoration. A welcome drink, cold handkerchief, and bottled water are provided.

- Destinations
Tuan Chau Island
Tung Sau area
Ti Top beach
Luon Bo area
Sung Sot Cave
Coconut Three Island
Fairy Lake Cave

- Activities
Cave exploration
Kayaking or bamboo boat ride
Swimming
Spa massages (with surcharge)
Cooking demonstration
Cooking class
Watching Vietnamese cultural films
Music entertainment
Squid fishing
Tai Chi
Visiting a traditional workshop (optional)

- Inclusions
English speaking tour guide on boat
All meals onboard (2 buffet lunches, 1 barbecue dinner, and 1 breakfast)
Kayak
Bamboo boat ride
Sightseeing entrance fees

- Exclusions
Shuttle bus Hanoi – Halong – Hanoi
Airfare
Visa arrangements
Beauty spa and massage services
Beverages
Tips and other personal expenses
All other services not clearly mentioned in inclusions
private_bathroom_highlight:
Free toiletries
Shower
Bidet
Toilet
Slippers
Hairdryer
Toilet paper

endescription:
Located on the second floor, these air-conditioned cabins offer sliding doors with panoramic views of the bay. The room includes a set a local fresh fruit and a bottle of wine. It is designed and fitted to international standards, featuring rich wood decoration. A welcome drink, cold handkerchief, and bottled water are provided.

Guests at this room can enjoy 2 cocktails in the afternoon.

Located on the second floor, this air-conditioned suite has a sliding door leading to a private balcony, which offers panoramic views of the bay. The room includes a set a local fresh fruit, a bottle of wine. It is designed and fitted to international standards, featuring rich wood decoration. A welcome drink, cold handkerchief, and bottled water are provided.

Guests at this room can enjoy 2 cocktails in the afternoon.

Activities
Cave exploration
Kayaking or bamboo boat ride
Swimming
Spa massages (with surcharge)
Cooking demonstration
Cooking class
Watching Vietnamese cultural films
Music entertainment
Squid fishing
Tai Chi
Visiting a traditional workshop (optional)

Inclusions
English speaking tour guide on boat
Luxury Cruise through Halong bay
All meals onboard (3 lunches, 2 dinners, and 2 breakfasts)
Kayaking, cooking class, Tai chi exercise, bamboo boat, swimming (if the weather permits), movies, squid fishing, music entertainment
Sightseeing entrance fees

Exclusions
Shuttle bus Hanoi – Halong – Hanoi
Airfare
Visa arrangements
Beauty spa and massage services
Beverages
Tips and other personal expenses
All other services not clearly mentioned in inclusions

What to bring:
Sun block
Camera + Films
Insect repellent
Original Passport
Wide brim hat
Swimming costume for summer
Sun glasses
Proper shoes for climbing in cave
Warm clothes for winter
